author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR makes some updates to the `AlpakaCore` README file, mainly to reflect https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41019 and to clarify a few things. It also extends the testing to cover the cases where the Alpaka backend is explicitly specified via the `ProcessAcceleratorAlpaka`, and moves to use `!serial` backend specification for the `DataFormats/PortableTestObjects`.

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/517

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run both with and without GPU.
title: Updates to AlpakaCore README and tests
